description.value:
1. Tithed (350xp): +3 Willpower or +3 Ballistic Skill. Gain any one noted Trained Common Lore Skill and any two from noted list of Trained Skills and Talents.
2. Born to Lead (200xp): +3 Intelligence or Fellowship, -3 Toughness. Gain Command, Literacy, and one listed Scholastic Lore as Trained Skills.
3. One Amongst Billions (200xp): +3 Perception or Intelligence, -3 Strength. Gain Paranoia and Unremarkable Talents, and any one Trade or Common Lore Trained Skill.

skills.name: any one noted Trained Common Lore
one listed Scholastic Lore as Trained

talents: any one Trade or Common Lore Trained
